query:
UPDATE 
            flow 
        SET
            path = $1,
            summary = $2,
            description = $3,
            dependency_job = NULL,
            lock_error_logs = '',
            draft_only = NULL,
            tag = $4,
            dedicated_worker = $5,
            visible_to_runner_only = $6,
            on_behalf_of_email = $7,
            value = $8,
            schema = $9::text::json,
            dyn_select_code = $10,
            dyn_select_lang = $11,
            edited_by = $12,
            edited_at = now()
        WHERE 
            path = $13 AND workspace_id = $14
